sentinelSimulator
*****************

This Python package simulates Sentinel 2 data based on output from the
JULES land surface model. Here we provide documentation on this
package. Below we illustrate a basic explanation of the package in
use.

Example of using sentinelSimulator package:

   import simulator as sim
   # Create class instance containing sentinel simulator data
   sim.Simulator(year=2012, month=1, days=365)


Features
========

* Simulates sentinel 2 data from JULES output

* Add additional explanation


Source Code
===========

github.com/example_user/sentinelSimulator
